org.fcrepo.client.impl

Class FedoraRepositoryImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fcrepo.client.impl.FedoraRepositoryImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.fcrepo.client.FedoraRepository
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ReadOnlyFedoraRepositoryImpl

    public class FedoraRepositoryImpl
extends Object
implements org.fcrepo.client.FedoraRepository
    FedoraRepositoryImpl manage httpclient instance to run requests
    Since:
    2014-08-11
    Author:
    lsitu, escowles
